birth_context.metadata: 1990s: The Walls fall and reunification rewired daily life; East_West habits blended with a new creative, tolerant city ethos.

formative_context.metadata: 2010s: Shiraz felt smartphone/social media dominance, populist swings, and widening inequality alongside resource politics, conservative-religious currents, and sanctions or reforms; locals commonly emphasized online-offline blending, personal branding, and gig-economy resilience and honor, hospitality, and care in public expression.

current_socio_demographics.societal_perceptions: as a young male immigrant professional, culturally expected to be self-reliant; stigma around discussing mental health persists

presenting_problem.summary: severe depressive episode following a painful breakup
